Title: Relates to offenses involving the use of a portable electronic device while driving
Summary: Expands the definitions of vehicular assault in the first degree, vehicular assault in the second degree and reckless driving to include offenses involving use of a portable electronic device while driving.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the penal law, in relation to expanding the definitions of vehicular assault in the first degree and vehicular assault in the second degree to include offenses involving use of a portable electronic device while driving; and to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to expanding the definition of reckless driving to include offenses involving use of a portable electronic device while driving
